description: All conditions, adventure bike riding shorts made with high stretch, breathable, waterproof Proflex™ fabric. Reinforced seat and inner thigh, with a relaxed fit and long cut, they have vent access to pockets and a soft feel to offer all day comfort.
name: Rab Cinder Kinetic Shorts - Mens

specs.key: 20 D Proflex™ 3-layer recycled polyester stretch knit face with PU membrane - 118 g/m² \DWR \ HH
20D Proflex™ Stretch Woven Nylon 3-layer Waterproof Technology with fluorocarbon-free DWR - 149 g/m² HH
